tool_description: Retrieves current statutory text and amendment history for specified statutes across federal and state jurisdictions.

statute_citation.description: Standard legal citation for the statute (e.g., '42 U.S.C. ยง 1983', 'Cal. Civ. Code ยง 1798.100')

jurisdiction.description: Jurisdiction name (federal, state name, or territory)

include_amendments.description: Whether to include amendment history and effective dates

error_messages: Invalid statute citation format: Use proper legal citation format with title, section, and subsection as applicable
Statute not found: The specified citation does not exist in the given jurisdiction
Invalid jurisdiction: Use 'federal' or a valid U.S. state/territory name
Access denied: Statute database temporarily unavailable, retry request
usage: Provide statute_citation and jurisdiction. Set include_amendments to true for historical analysis. Returns current text and optional amendment history.

effective_date.description: Current version effective date in ISO 8601 format

title.description: Official title or heading of the statute

amendment_dates.description: Dates of amendments if requested, in ISO 8601 format

amendment_summaries.description: Brief descriptions of each amendment if requested
